message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for a limited time at the special price of $200. I think you'll agree it's a great deal!
I'm really interested in the product, but $200 is a bit too steep for me. I'd be willing to pay $80 for it.
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I understand your position, but $80 is significantly below its value. How about we meet in the middle at $140?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but $140 is still a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $90 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product.  I'm trying to be fair, but I can't go as low as $90.  My final offer is $120.  It's a fantastic deal!
I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but $120 is still a bit too high for me. I'd be willing to pay $85 for the product.
